document.full_text: zimbabwean president robert mugabe said on thursday the government would go ahead with the takeover of foreign companies, a scheme that has rattled investors, and told western countries to stop meddling in his country's affairs.
document.title: mugabe says to proceed with foreign firm takeovers
lines_and_colors: zimbabwean president robert mugabe said on thursday the government would go ahead with the takeover of foreign companies, a scheme that has rattled investors, and told western countries to stop meddling in his country's affairs.
